description: Style definitions for the Tic Tac Toe web application, including theme management variables and responsive design elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, centers content and applies primary background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo styling for the application, includes height and interaction behaviors.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the application, consists of layout, background color, and font settings.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling for the application, applies theme color and transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, with styles for normal, hover, and active states.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Keyframe animation for spinning the application logo.
